Reviews.Title: Confusing description, but works well and great price !
Reviews.Author: B. Sullivan
Reviews.Content: I've been looking for sometime for an affordable 8 channel multiplexer.  This unit works well and is a good value.  Easy to setup and use.  Happy with purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good Unit For Price
Reviews.Author: steve laskowsky
Reviews.Content: Bought this unit to monitor 8 different color cameras at once on one monitor. Like the different configurations available at the touch of a button. Video quality is not very good, but that was  expected at this price.

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: William Howland
Reviews.Content: Was delivered as advertised and functioned as describe it would.Prices was right.No dancing girls came with it...sigh!Nice little unit.

Reviews.Title: Good q processor
Reviews.Author: Reggie
Reviews.Content: We just got it and it seems to be a good choice as we use it for our church video production or recording of our services.  With it, our video director can see several views of our cameras at one time.

ProductInfo.Features:
Video Output Mode :Full screen, electronic amplification, 8 picture,/4 picture, Picture in Picture, Auto switch display mode
Dimension 210mmx150mmx40mm (LxWxH)
Resolution  PAL: 720x576 NTSC: 720x480
ProductInfo.Name: Evertech Office Home Video Security Camera Cctv Color Quad Splitter Processor 8 Channel (8 Camera)
